data.prayer: Jesus, please bless the leaders of the the county of Katihar, Bihar, India who work hard at shepherding and guiding your people.
data.verse: With upright heart he shepherded them and guided them with his skillful hand.

data.location_label: Photo from the county of Katihar, Bihar, India
data.section_summary: What people or resources could you pray for in this photo?

data.prayer: Lord, let it be said of the 3,037,219 lost in Katihar that you have called them out of darkness into your glorious light.
data.verse: But you are a chosen race, a royal priesthood, a holy nation, a people for God’s own possession, that you may proclaim the excellence of him who called you out of darkness into his marvelous light

data.label_1: One disciple of Jesus for every 90 lost neighbors

data.prayer: Lord, we know that you invest more in those who have been faithful with what they have been given. Please, richly bless each faithful believer in Katihar with more spiritual insight, wisdom, courage and vision.
data.verse: So take the bag of gold from him and give it to the one who has ten bags. For whoever has will be given more, and they will have an abundance. Whoever does not have, even what they have will be taken from them.

data.prayer: Father, guide the church in Katihar, Bihar, India to see their community as a holy priesthood, offering spiritual sacrifices acceptable to God.
data.verse: you also, like living stones, are being built into a spiritual house to be a holy priesthood, offering spiritual sacrifices acceptable to God through Jesus Christ.

data.prayer: Lord, remember the Beldar Lonari (Hindu traditions) people. Make the Beldar Lonari (Hindu traditions) people a chosen race, a royal priesthood, a holy nation, a people for your own possession.
Father, bring yourself glory in Katihar. Through your servants plant 614 new churches that love you, love one another, and make disciples this year.
data.verse: For the earth will be filled with the knowledge of the glory of the LORD as the waters cover the sea.

data.prayer: Father, we pray the believers are good spiritual stewards of their everyday relationships in Katihar, Bihar, India.
Lord we pray you unite the 33,781 believers to pray at all times in the Spirit, with all prayer and supplication, for spiritual breakthrough in Katihar.
data.verse: in every situation, by prayer and petition, with thanksgiving, present your requests to God.

location.name: Katihar
location.people_groups_list: Musahar (Hindu traditions), Bhalla, Aoghar, Rajput Dikhit, Atishbaz
